::KitKat::

She saw on the monitor that Land Mine was being held more like a 
hostage.  She looked at her rifle and sighed. She knew what she had 
to do.  She grabbed her rifle and ran outside.  She looked at 
Terrorsaur and let a tear run down her cheek.  She raised her rifle.  
She took careful aim at Land Mine's head and pulled the trigger. "May 
she forgive me." she whispered.

KitKat knew that as long as one of her team was a hostage, they would 
suffer.  She cared to much for her friend to let her suffer at the 
hands of those bots who were crueler than any Predacon she had ever 
seen.  She cried on the inside since she made the decision.  She knew 
that this was the only way to end it.  By killing her friend and 
ending her suffering at the hands of the maximals.
